title: Learning-Oriented Leadership Development: Growth Through Language and Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental leadership concepts and experience in organizational settings
context.additional_context: Language-based leadership development program with real-time feedback and enhanced collaboration using digital tools

learning_goals: Present at least three actionable strategies for learners to identify and leverage learning opportunities arising in daily work tasks.
Practice applying learning facilitation techniques—such as feedback, role modeling, and challenging questioning—to language learning scenarios.
Analyze constraints (time/budget/perception) to fostering a learning culture within an organization and propose improvement measures.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
